Welcome to the Roundtable Tracker

The comprehensive tracker for Elden Ring, made by completionists, for completionists.

This site is still a work in-progress. We are working on it every day.

I have feedback, how can I contribute?

Contributing is easy! And does not require you to know how to code. You can find instructions on the GitHub repository. You can also simply report issues and we'll fix them.

Or you can join the development discord, and ask us there.

Can I use this for multiple characters?

Yup, use the profile selector and buttons in the options tab at the top of the page to setup multiple profiles.

How does the checklist status get saved?

The checklist is saved to your browser's local storage. Be careful when clearing your browser's cache as it will also destroy your saved progress.

Thanks

This sheet would not be possible without the incredible work already done by the team at Fextralife, the team behind MapGenie, fellow redditors /u/Athrek and /u/AcceptablePackMule, and the rest of the community.

The foundation of this website was based on ZKjellberg's Dark Soul's 3 Cheat Sheet source code.

DISCLAIMER

This tracker is still a work in progress, and as such, we apologize for any issues that might come about as we update the checklist and iron out bugs.

We will do our best to ensure that such issues remain few and far between.

Begin next journey?

If you begin the next journey, all progress on the "Playthrough" and "Misc" tabs of this profile will be reset, while achievement and collection checklists will be kept.
